name: Yalin Bastanlar
content: Yalın Baştanlar - Computer Engineering Department Computer Engineering Department Izmir Institute of Technology Search Computer Engineering Department Izmir Institute of Technology Home About People Research Research Focus Projects Publications Collaborations Education Undergraduate Program MS Programs CENG MS Program SEDS MS Program PhD Program Minor Program Contact lidya multisite > Computer Engineering Department > Yalın Baştanlar Yalın Baştanlar Professor Professor Yalın Baştanlar studied civil engineering at the Middle East Technical University (METU) and obtained B.S. degree in 2001. He started to work on computer vision for his graduate studies and he obtained his M.S. (2005) and Ph.D. (2009) from the Information Systems Department of Informatics Institute. Apart from his administrative duties, he also runs the Computer Vision Research Group in the department.
